text:
Enjoy @holly_cummins introducing some of the new tools, patterns and best practices for #java development in #2022 -as well as the most painful anti-patterns she has been as a consultant with the #IBM Garage. 

#vdathens2022 #athens #techlovers #coding #development #redhat https://t.co/EQ1EGNPmy8

author.name: Devoxx Greece
author.description: Devoxx Greece 2023 (first edition) takes place for the very first time from May 4th until the 6th in the Athens Megaron International Conference Center.
